## Vote.get() method

Get a proposal by id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(proposalId: BigNumberish): Promise<Proposal>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  proposalId | BigNumberish | The proposal id to get. |
